text: Just refactored our app to use separate RTK Query slices for each API. The codebase is so much cleaner now! #React #Redux #CleanCode
The performance improvements with Server Components are incredible. It's a game changer for building fast, dynamic web applications.
Loving the consistency and ease of use with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS. Building beautiful, responsive UIs has never been faster. #UI #UX
TypeScript 5.0's decorators are amazing! Finally have proper metadata reflection working seamlessly with our NestJS backend. #TypeScript #NestJS
Migrated our entire CI/CD pipeline to GitHub Actions. The developer experience is so much better now. Zero downtime deployments! ðŸš€
Working with Prisma and PostgreSQL has been a dream. The type safety across the entire stack is incredible. #Prisma #PostgreSQL #FullStack
React Native's new architecture is finally stable! The performance improvements are noticeable, especially on Android devices. #ReactNative
Apollo Client's new caching strategies have reduced our API calls by 60%. GraphQL + proper caching = developer happiness! #GraphQL #Apollo
